lines.text:
[to Stan]
It's better to spend one night with a corpse than 60 days with the cops.
How about some dinner? I'm getting hungry.
Don't be so greedy. We just split a hamburger, and besides we can eat in Dayton for half of what it costs us in the diner.
I know, but I'll be twice as hungry in the morning.

[in reference to the con men they met on the train]
Thank you! Two princes!

[referring to Stan and Ollie]
A couple of jerks!

[to Stan]
Well, here's another nice predicament you've gotten me into.
